funding-source.named-content: Penn State Huck Institutes of the Life Sciences
NIH/National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID)

funding-group.funding-statement: This study was supported by funds from the Penn State Huck Institutes of the Life Sciences and NIH/National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) grants R21AI128918, R01AI116636, and R01AI128201 to JLR.
